metadata.name: Water
metadata.description:
NFT 1/1

.png
7147 x 4182 px
72 dpi

One work was presented at the CURIOSA SECTOR of [Paris Photo 2021](https://www.parisphoto.com/en-gb/exhibitor.html) - curated by [Shoair Mavlian](https://www.parisphoto.com/en-gb/fair/news/curators-parisphoto2021.html) and represented by [Galerie Judith Andreae](https://www.galerie-andreae.de/).

Available as a giclée print on archival metallic paper mounted on dibond aluminium with resign on top.

200 x 117 cm / 250 x 146 cm

Edition of 3 + 1 AP in each size
